# ----------------------------------------------
# Test name: 	SN1X0_Selftest_RF-On
# Description:	Turn RF ON (usefull for factory tests)
# Revision:		1.01
# Date:			04/04/2019
# Tool rev:		1.12 or later
# ----------------------------------------------

version
interval 200
reset 1

// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000100
receive
// NCI CORE INIT CMD
send 2001020000

// NCI SYSTEM ENABLE PROPRIETARY CMD
send 2F0200

// NCI Disable standby mode
send 2F000100

// Stop CONTINUOUS RF ON 
send 2F3F03320000
